  8. ä»£ç æ¶æ„é‡æ„ - DownView é¢„è§ˆç»„ä»¶å’Œä¾§è¾¹æ é€»è¾‘é‡æ„ï¼Œæ ·å¼æ–‡ä»¶æ¨¡å—åŒ–ä¾¿äºç»´æŠ¤ï¼Œç”šè‡³æ”¯æŒ VSCode å¼€å‘äº†

New DiscoveriesğŸ¥œ

  1. Improve the theme switching function, support adaptive system themes, fix list selection behavior, and improve the accuracy of file type detection.
  2. Enhanced Navigation & Image Support â€“ Added automatic TOC (Table of Contents) generation for article navigation, PicList image-hosting uploads, and support for referencing local images from any location.
  3. Improved Editing Efficiency â€“ Quick template insertion via the Tab key, automatic file change detection and refresh, and optimized bottom spacing in the editor.
  4. Upgraded PPT Presentation Mode â€“ More customizable configuration parameters, substantially refined styles, and a more professional presentation experience.
  5. Major Preview Rendering Upgrade â€“ Overall improvements to preview visuals and interactions; optimized styles for Mermaid, Markmap, and PlantUML; and better code block and inline code display.
  6. Key Bug Fixes â€“ Fixed preview styles failing after long sessions, resolved potential editor crashes, and corrected abnormal expand/collapse logic in the notes list.
  7. Performance & UX Improvements â€“ Significantly faster content search, optimized export to avoid timeouts, and disabled elastic scrolling for more precise operations.
  8. Code Architecture Refactor â€“ Rebuilt the DownView preview component and sidebar logic, modularized style files for easier maintenance, and even enabled development in VS Code.

  5. å¼‚æ­¥å›¾ç‰‡ä¸Šä¼ æ›´ä¸æ»‘ï¼Œé¢„è§ˆæ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œç¼–è¾‘çŠ¶æ€ä¸‹ä½“éªŒæ›´ä¸€è‡´
  6. å¯¼å‡ºæ•ˆæœä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆå†…å®¹æ›´åŠ ç¨³å®šï¼Œæ’ç‰ˆæ˜¾ç¤ºæ›´ç²¾è‡´

New Face ğŸ‰

  1. Brand-new icon design clearer and more beautiful, smoother theme switching with standardized divider colors and unified background
  2. Support top navigation and shortcut key operation, ESC/â†’ key switching is more convenient
  3. Settings panel redesigned, improved font & language experience
  4. Fixed title and search box switching issues, standardized search box, optimized search behavior to handle empty input
  5. Asynchronous image upload for smoother experience, optimized preview performance, improved consistency in editing state
  6. Optimized export effects with more stable output and refined layout display
  7. Comprehensive upgrade to Swift 6 with optimized code implementation and annotations, adapted to new features for improved performance and stability
  8. Removed recommended font dependencies, refactored code structure, optimized undo/redo functionality and fixed font selection issues
